message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CE, cs.IR, cs.SI 

The paper deals with a novel formulation of the multi-armed bandit model, which is a popular topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper proposes two novel algorithms for handling stationary and nonstationary environments, which are relevant to the sub-categories of machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper also mentions online problems arising in clinical trials, recommender systems, and attention modeling, which are relevant to the sub-categories of computational epidemiology, information retrieval, and social and information networks. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG and cs.AI, followed by cs.CE, cs.IR, and cs.SI.
